levelName: 英文單字認讀成長級(九)

examples.english: We sat in the third row at the movie theater.
examples.chinese: 我們坐在電影院的第三排。

examples.english: There is a beautiful row of trees along the street.
examples.chinese: 沿著街道有一排美麗的樹。

examples.english: Please arrange the chairs in two straight rows.
examples.chinese: 請把椅子排成兩排整齊的。

examples.english: More than a million tourists visit Taiwan every year.
examples.chinese: 每年有超過一百萬名遊客造訪台灣。

examples.english: Thanks a million for helping me with my homework.
examples.chinese: 非常感謝你幫我寫功課！

examples.english: Learning English can open up millions of opportunities for you.
examples.chinese: 學習英文能為你開啟數百萬個機會。

examples.english: A white goose swam gracefully in the pond.
examples.chinese: 一隻白鵝優雅地在池塘裡游泳。

examples.english: The cold air gave me goosebumps on my arms.
examples.chinese: 寒冷的空氣讓我手臂上起了雞皮疙瘩。

examples.english: We enjoyed delicious roasted goose for dinner last night.
examples.chinese: 昨晚我們享用了美味的烤鵝當晚餐。

examples.english: Look! There's a small green bug on the leaf.
examples.chinese: 看！葉子上有一隻小綠蟲。

examples.english: My mother hates those tiny bugs in the kitchen.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽討厭廚房裡那些小蟲子。

examples.english: Some bugs can fly, but others just crawl on the ground.
examples.chinese: 有些蟲子會飛，但有些只會在地上爬。

examples.english: The brown hen laid a fresh egg in the nesting box this morning.
examples.chinese: 棕色的母雞今天早上在巢箱裡下了一顆新鮮的蛋。

examples.english: A mother hen always protects her little chicks from danger.
examples.chinese: 母雞總是保護她的小雞免受危險。

examples.english: On the farm, the farmer raises hens for their delicious eggs.
examples.chinese: 在農場裡，農夫養母雞是為了牠們美味的蛋。

examples.english: Kids love to dress up in scary costumes for Halloween.
examples.chinese: 孩子們喜歡在萬聖節打扮成可怕的服裝。

examples.english: Halloween is celebrated every year on October 31st.
examples.chinese: 萬聖節每年在十月三十一日慶祝。

examples.english: Many children go trick-or-treating to get candy on Halloween.
examples.chinese: 許多孩子在萬聖節去要糖果。

examples.english: Families often carry colorful lanterns during the Lantern Festival.
examples.chinese: 在元宵節期間，家人們常常提著五顏六色的燈籠。

examples.english: Many red lanterns decorated the street for the night market.
examples.chinese: 許多紅色燈籠裝飾著街道，為夜市增添氣氛。

examples.english: We lit a bright lantern to guide our way through the dark forest.
examples.chinese: 我們點亮了一盞明亮的提燈，照亮穿過黑暗森林的路。

examples.english: He told a scary ghost story about the abandoned hospital.
examples.chinese: 他講了一個關於廢棄醫院的恐怖鬼故事。

examples.english: The ghost of the past still haunted her dreams.
examples.chinese: 過去的陰影(鬼魂)仍在她的夢中縈繞。

examples.english: They explored the ghost town, finding many old buildings.
examples.chinese: 他們探索了這個鬼城，發現了許多舊建築。

examples.english: He wore a scary mask for the Halloween party.
examples.chinese: 他萬聖節派對戴了一個可怕的面具。

examples.english: Many people wear a mask to prevent getting sick.
examples.chinese: 許多人戴口罩是為了防止生病。

examples.english: She put on a facial mask to make her skin soft.
examples.chinese: 她敷了面膜讓她的皮膚更柔軟。

examples.english: Don't forget to ring the doorbell when you arrive.
examples.chinese: 別忘了你抵達時要按門鈴。

examples.english: I heard the doorbell ring, so I went to open the door.
examples.chinese: 我聽到門鈴響了，所以我去開門。

examples.english: The doorbell helps us know when someone is outside.
examples.chinese: 門鈴幫助我們知道有人在外面。

examples.english: Her amazing singing performance surprised everyone in the audience.
examples.chinese: 她精彩的歌唱表演讓所有觀眾都感到驚喜。

examples.english: My friends planned a big surprise party for my birthday.
examples.chinese: 我的朋友們為我的生日策劃了一個大大的驚喜派對。

examples.english: To my surprise, the lost cat returned home safely today.
examples.chinese: 令我驚訝的是，那隻走失的貓今天安全地回家了。

examples.english: It takes time to gain valuable work experience.
examples.chinese: 獲得寶貴的工作經驗需要時間。

examples.english: My first time abroad was an exciting experience.
examples.chinese: 我第一次出國是一次令人興奮的經歷。

examples.english: You will experience new challenges in high school.
examples.chinese: 你在高中將會經歷新的挑戰。

examples.english: My brother will attend senior high school after junior high graduation.
examples.chinese: 我哥哥國中畢業後會上高中。

examples.english: Many students dream of a wonderful senior high school life.
examples.chinese: 許多學生夢想著美好的高中生活。

examples.english: Taipei First Girls' High School is a famous senior high school in Taiwan.
examples.chinese: 北一女中是台灣一所著名的高中。

examples.english: The news of her success brought great joy to her family.
examples.chinese: 她成功的消息帶給她家人莫大的喜悅。

examples.english: My new puppy is a true joy in my life.
examples.chinese: 我的新小狗是我生命中真正的喜悅。

examples.english: We felt much joy planning our summer vacation trip.
examples.chinese: 我們在規劃暑假旅行時感到非常喜悅。

examples.english: We use a little olive oil to cook healthy dishes.
examples.chinese: 我們用一點橄欖油來煮健康的菜餚。

examples.english: Oil is a vital natural resource used for producing gasoline.
examples.chinese: 石油是生產汽油的重要自然資源。

examples.english: Students often burn the midnight oil before big exams.
examples.chinese: 學生們在大考前常常熬夜苦讀。

examples.english: We need to get some gas for the car.
examples.chinese: 我們需要為車子加點汽油。

examples.english: The gas is used for heating our home.
examples.chinese: 瓦斯被用來加熱我們的家。

examples.english: He stepped on the gas to drive faster.
examples.chinese: 他踩下油門開得更快。

examples.english: We can see a beautiful view from the top of the hill.
examples.chinese: 我們可以從山頂看到美麗的景色。

examples.english: Reading books is a top priority for me every day.
examples.chinese: 每天閱讀對我來說是首要之務。

examples.english: Please put the top back on the jar after you use it.
examples.chinese: 用完之後請把蓋子蓋回罐子上。

examples.english: She read several interesting books last month.
examples.chinese: 她上個月讀了幾本有趣的書。

examples.english: We waited for several minutes, but the bus didn't come.
examples.chinese: 我們等了好幾分鐘，但公車沒來。

examples.english: Several of my classmates went to the concert last night.
examples.chinese: 我有幾個同學昨晚去聽演唱會了。

examples.english: Do you think these beautiful flowers are real, or just fake?
examples.chinese: 你覺得這些漂亮的花是真的，還是假的？

examples.english: It was a real challenge to climb that high mountain.
examples.chinese: 爬那座高山是一個真正的挑戰。

examples.english: A real friend helps you even when things are difficult.
examples.chinese: 一個真正的朋友，即使事情很困難也會幫助你。

examples.english: Swimming in this river after heavy rain is very dangerous.
examples.chinese: 大雨過後在這條河裡游泳非常危險。

examples.english: Ignoring the warning signs could be very dangerous.
examples.chinese: 忽視這些警訊可能非常危險。

examples.english: Staying up late every night is dangerous for your health.
examples.chinese: 每天熬夜對你的健康很危險。

examples.english: We are all excited for the field trip next week.
examples.chinese: 我們都對下週的校外教學感到很興奮。

examples.english: She was excited by the wonderful story her friend told.
examples.chinese: 她被朋友講的精彩故事弄得很興奮。

examples.english: The students were excited to meet the famous author.
examples.chinese: 學生們對於能見到那位知名作家感到很興奮。

examples.english: The soccer game was very exciting last night.
examples.chinese: 昨晚那場足球賽非常令人興奮。

examples.english: We are planning an exciting trip to Kenting next summer.
examples.chinese: 我們計畫明年夏天去墾丁玩，那會是趟令人興奮的旅行。

examples.english: Learning about space travel is really exciting for me.
examples.chinese: 對我來說，學習太空旅行的知識真的令人興奮。

examples.english: Many children are scared of ghosts in scary movies.
examples.chinese: 許多孩子在恐怖電影中會害怕鬼魂。

examples.english: He was too scared to ask for help after making a mistake.
examples.chinese: 他犯錯後太害怕了，不敢尋求幫助。

examples.english: She felt scared that she might get lost in the big city alone.
examples.chinese: 她感到害怕，擔心自己可能會獨自在大城市迷路。

examples.english: I felt so bored staying home alone with nothing to do.
examples.chinese: 我一個人在家沒事做時感到很厭煩。

examples.english: The long history lesson made all the students bored.
examples.chinese: 那堂冗長的歷史課讓所有學生都感到厭煩。

examples.english: If you are bored, maybe you can try learning a new skill.
examples.chinese: 如果你感到厭煩，也許可以試著學習新技能。

examples.english: You should finish your homework before watching TV.
examples.chinese: 在看電視前，你應該先完成你的家庭作業。

examples.english: We have a lot of homework in science class today.
examples.chinese: 我們今天在自然課有很多家庭作業。

examples.english: Don't forget to hand in your English homework tomorrow.
examples.chinese: 別忘了明天繳交你的英文家庭作業。

examples.english: I was surprised by his sudden visit yesterday.
examples.chinese: 我對他昨天的突然來訪感到很驚訝。

examples.english: The final score really surprised all the players.
examples.chinese: 最後的比數真的讓所有球員感到驚訝。

examples.english: It was quite surprising that she won the competition.
examples.chinese: 她竟然贏得比賽，這讓大家感到很驚訝。

examples.english: Many people travel to the north of Taiwan in winter.
examples.chinese: 許多人在冬天會到台灣的北方旅行。

examples.english: The north wind in winter is often very strong and cold.
examples.chinese: 冬天的北風通常非常強勁而且寒冷。

examples.english: Many birds fly north in spring to find warmer weather.
examples.chinese: 許多鳥類在春天會向北飛，尋找更溫暖的天氣。

examples.english: The sun sets in the west every evening.
examples.chinese: 太陽每天傍晚在西方落下。

examples.english: We need to drive west for about an hour.
examples.chinese: 我們需要向西開車大約一小時。

examples.english: Many students dream of studying in the West.
examples.chinese: 許多學生夢想著到西方國家讀書。

examples.english: The wind blew from the east, bringing cooler air.
examples.chinese: 風從東方吹來，帶來了涼爽的空氣。

examples.english: They live in the east part of the city, near a big park.
examples.chinese: 他們住在這座城市的東邊，靠近一個大公園。

examples.english: The ship sailed east across the wide ocean to a new land.
examples.chinese: 這艘船向東航行，穿越了寬闊的海洋，前往一個新的地方。

examples.english: The weather in the south of Taiwan is often very warm.
examples.chinese: 台灣的南方天氣通常很溫暖。

examples.english: A warm south wind blew softly through the open window.
examples.chinese: 一股溫暖的南風輕輕地吹過敞開的窗戶。

examples.english: Many migratory birds fly south during the cold winter.
examples.chinese: 許多候鳥在寒冷的冬天會向南飛。

examples.english: My grandmother loves to grow many colorful flowers in her garden.
examples.chinese: 我的奶奶喜歡在她的花園裡種植許多色彩繽紛的花朵。

examples.english: Children grow very fast, so they need new clothes often.
examples.chinese: 孩子們長大得很快，所以他們常常需要新衣服。

examples.english: His passion for learning began to grow after joining the science club.
examples.chinese: 他在加入科學社團後，對學習的熱情開始增長。

examples.english: She has been learning English since elementary school.
examples.chinese: 她從國小以來就一直在學英文。

examples.english: Since it's raining, we should stay home today.
examples.chinese: 既然下雨了，我們今天就應該待在家裡。

examples.english: Ever since I met you, my life has been happier.
examples.chinese: 自從我遇見你之後，我的生活就更快樂了。

examples.english: Driving during rush hour means dealing with heavy traffic.
examples.chinese: 在尖峰時段開車會遇到大量車潮。

examples.english: Always follow traffic lights and signs for safety.
examples.chinese: 為了安全，務必遵守交通號誌與標誌。

examples.english: I missed my bus because I was stuck in traffic.
examples.chinese: 我因為塞車所以錯過了公車。

examples.english: In this case, we need to think carefully.
examples.chinese: 在這種情況下，我們需要仔細思考。

examples.english: His behavior is a clear case of disrespect.
examples.chinese: 他的行為是一個明顯不尊重的例子。

examples.english: The hospital reported many new cases of flu.
examples.chinese: 醫院通報了許多新的流感病例。

examples.english: Please wait for me near the school gate after class.
examples.chinese: 下課後請在校門附近等我。

examples.english: Our flight is boarding now at Gate A3 for Taipei.
examples.chinese: 我們的班機現在在A3登機門登機前往台北。

examples.english: Remember to close the garden gate so the dog won't run out.
examples.chinese: 記得關上花園的閘門，以免狗狗跑出去。

examples.english: A teenager is someone between 13 and 19 years old.
examples.chinese: 青少年是指年齡在13到19歲之間的人。

examples.english: Many teenagers enjoy playing video games and hanging out with friends.
examples.chinese: 很多青少年喜歡玩電玩和跟朋友出去玩。

examples.english: Becoming a teenager can be confusing, but also full of new discoveries.
examples.chinese: 成為青少年可能會令人困惑，但也充滿新的發現。

examples.english: Excuse me, where is the nearest restroom?
examples.chinese: 請問，最近的廁所在哪裡？

examples.english: I need to use the restroom before we leave the restaurant.
examples.chinese: 在我們離開餐廳前，我需要去一下廁所。

examples.english: The restroom on this floor is always very clean.
examples.chinese: 這一層樓的廁所總是打掃得很乾淨。

examples.english: All students must wear their school uniform properly on weekdays.
examples.chinese: 所有學生在平日都必須正確穿著校服。

examples.english: The flight attendant's uniform looked very elegant and professional.
examples.chinese: 那位空服員的制服看起來非常優雅且專業。

examples.english: The soldiers marched with uniform steps during the parade.
examples.chinese: 士兵們在遊行中以整齊劃一的步伐行進。

examples.english: My sister likes to paint landscapes in her free time.
examples.chinese: 我的姊姊喜歡在空閒時畫風景畫。

examples.english: They will paint their old house blue next month.
examples.chinese: 他們下個月會把舊房子漆成藍色。

examples.english: Be careful; the wet paint on the bench is still fresh.
examples.chinese: 小心；長凳上的濕油漆還沒乾。

examples.english: This new bridge connects the two sides of the river.
examples.chinese: 這座新橋連接了河的兩岸。

examples.english: Education is a bridge to a better future for students.
examples.chinese: 教育是學生通往更美好未來的橋樑。

examples.english: Good communication helps bridge the differences between people.
examples.chinese: 良好的溝通有助於消除人與人之間的差異。

examples.english: We drove to the airport early to catch our flight.
examples.chinese: 我們很早就開車到機場去搭飛機。

examples.english: The new airport has many duty-free shops and restaurants.
examples.chinese: 這座新機場有許多免稅商店和餐廳。

examples.english: My parents will pick me up at the airport tomorrow afternoon.
examples.chinese: 我的父母明天下午會到機場接我。

examples.english: My friend sent me a postcard when she visited Kenting last summer.
examples.chinese: 我的朋友去年夏天去墾丁玩的時候寄給我一張明信片。

examples.english: Don't forget to buy some postcards at the gift shop for your family.
examples.chinese: 別忘了在禮品店買幾張明信片給你的家人。

examples.english: This postcard shows a beautiful temple and has a handwritten message.
examples.chinese: 這張明信片上有一座美麗的寺廟，還有一段手寫的訊息。

examples.english: He tripped on the last stair before reaching the top.
examples.chinese: 他在抵達頂端的最後一階樓梯絆倒了。

examples.english: We walked up the stairs to the third floor.
examples.chinese: 我們走樓梯到三樓。

examples.english: The old building has a beautiful wooden stair.
examples.chinese: 這棟老建築物有一座美麗的木製樓梯。

examples.english: He is a hard-working student, so he always gets good grades.
examples.chinese: 他是個勤奮的學生，所以他總是考取好成績。

examples.english: Being hard-working is important for success in any field.
examples.chinese: 勤奮工作對在任何領域取得成功都很重要。

examples.english: Our hard-working team completed the project ahead of schedule.
examples.chinese: 我們勤奮的團隊提前完成了這個專案。

examples.english: The audience clapped loudly after the exciting performance.
examples.chinese: 觀眾在精彩的表演後熱烈鼓掌。

examples.english: My coach clapped me on the back to congratulate me.
examples.chinese: 我的教練拍了拍我的背來恭喜我。

examples.english: The teacher asked the students to clap their hands to the music.
examples.chinese: 老師要求學生們跟著音樂拍手。

examples.english: Please be serious; this is not a joke.
examples.chinese: 請嚴肅一點；這不是開玩笑。

examples.english: She is a serious student and always finishes her homework.
examples.chinese: 她是一個認真的學生，總會完成她的作業。

examples.english: Don't take it lightly; this is a serious matter.
examples.chinese: 不要輕視它；這是一件很嚴重的事。

examples.english: This English homework is very simple; I can finish it quickly without any trouble.
examples.chinese: 這個英文作業很簡單；我能很快地完成，沒有任何困難。

examples.english: Sometimes, a simple design is actually better than something too complicated.
examples.chinese: 有時候，一個簡單的設計實際上比太複雜的東西更好。

examples.english: Despite his success, he still prefers to live a simple life in his hometown.
examples.chinese: 儘管他很成功，他仍然喜歡在家鄉過著簡單的生活。

examples.english: We must cross the river to reach the village.
examples.chinese: 我們必須跨越這條河才能到達那個村莊。

examples.english: He ran fast to cross the finish line.
examples.chinese: 他跑得很快，為了跨越終點線。

examples.english: It's hard to cross cultural barriers in a new country.
examples.chinese: 在一個新的國家，要跨越文化障礙很困難。

examples.english: You must show your ID card before you enter the building.
examples.chinese: 你必須先出示你的身份證才能進入這棟建築物。

examples.english: She worked hard to enter her dream university next year.
examples.chinese: 她努力學習，希望能明年進入她夢想的大學。

examples.english: Please enter all your answers into the computer system by Friday.
examples.chinese: 請在星期五前將所有答案輸入電腦系統。

examples.english: A rainbow appeared in the sky after the rain.
examples.chinese: 雨後，天空出現了一道彩虹。

examples.english: It appears that she needs help with her homework.
examples.chinese: 她看起來似乎需要別人幫忙寫功課。

examples.english: My favorite actor will appear in a new movie next year.
examples.chinese: 我最喜歡的演員明年會出演一部新電影。

examples.english: Is there enough space for another chair in the room?
examples.chinese: 房間裡還有足夠的空間放另一張椅子嗎？

examples.english: Many people dream of traveling to outer space someday.
examples.chinese: 許多人夢想有一天能到外太空旅行。

examples.english: Sometimes, everyone needs a little personal space to relax.
examples.chinese: 有時候，每個人都需要一點個人空間來放鬆。

examples.english: You should never lie to your parents about your grades.
examples.chinese: 你不應該對你父母說關於你成績的謊話。

examples.english: He lied about eating the last piece of cake from the fridge.
examples.chinese: 他撒謊說不是他吃了冰箱裡最後一塊蛋糕。

examples.english: Telling a lie often causes bigger problems in the long run.
examples.chinese: 說謊通常會導致長遠來看更大的問題。

examples.english: The morning sun always shines through my window.
examples.chinese: 清晨的陽光總是透過我的窗戶照進來。

examples.english: She really shined during the school talent show.
examples.chinese: 她在學校的才藝表演中表現得非常出色。

examples.english: Please shine your flashlight on that dark corner.
examples.chinese: 請把你的手電筒照向那個黑暗的角落。

examples.english: My grandma prays to God for our safety every day.
examples.chinese: 我的奶奶每天向上帝祈禱我們平安。

examples.english: I pray that everyone will be safe from the typhoon.
examples.chinese: 我祈求大家都能從颱風中平安。

examples.english: She prayed her parents would let her go to the concert.
examples.chinese: 她祈求父母能讓她去聽演唱會。

examples.english: This red pen belongs to my classmate, Lisa.
examples.chinese: 這支紅筆屬於我的同學麗莎。

examples.english: Do you belong to the school's drama club this year?
examples.chinese: 你今年屬於學校的戲劇社嗎？

examples.english: Sometimes, I feel I don't belong in this big city.
examples.chinese: 有時候，我覺得我不屬於這個大城市。

examples.english: The city plans to build a new library for its residents.
examples.chinese: 這座城市計畫為居民建造一座新圖書館。

examples.english: It's important to build trust with your friends.
examples.chinese: 與朋友建立信任很重要。

examples.english: He wants to build his own business in the future.
examples.chinese: 他想在未來建立自己的事業。

examples.english: Have you ever seen a shooting star at night?
examples.chinese: 你曾經在晚上看過流星嗎？

examples.english: This is the smartest dog I have ever met.
examples.chinese: 這是我曾經遇過最聰明的狗。

examples.english: Nobody ever believed his strange story before.
examples.chinese: 從來沒有人曾經相信他奇怪的故事。

examples.english: It rained all day; however, we still had fun.
examples.chinese: 整天下雨；然而，我們仍然玩得很開心。

examples.english: The task looked easy; however, it was actually quite challenging.
examples.chinese: 這項任務看起來很簡單；然而，它實際上相當有挑戰性。

examples.english: You must study hard; however, don't forget to rest.
examples.chinese: 你必須努力學習；然而，別忘了休息。

examples.english: She almost missed the bus to school this morning.
examples.chinese: 她今天早上差點錯過校車。

examples.english: We almost finished the group project before the deadline.
examples.chinese: 我們幾乎在截止日期前完成了分組報告。

examples.english: It's almost six o'clock; let's go home for dinner.
examples.chinese: 已經幾乎六點了；我們回家吃晚餐吧。

examples.english: After waiting for an hour, the bus finally arrived.
examples.chinese: 等待一小時後，公車終於來了。

examples.english: He practiced basketball every day and finally became the team captain.
examples.chinese: 他每天練習籃球，最後成為了隊長。

examples.english: First, mix the ingredients, then bake it, and finally, add the frosting.
examples.chinese: 首先，混合這些材料，然後烘烤，最後加上糖霜。

examples.english: The movie was quite interesting, so I watched it twice.
examples.chinese: 這部電影相當有趣，所以我看了兩次。

examples.english: Are you quite sure you locked the door before leaving?
examples.chinese: 你完全確定離開前鎖門了嗎？

examples.english: Visiting the old temple was quite an experience for us.
examples.chinese: 參觀那座舊寺廟對我們來說是個相當特別的體驗。

examples.english: Please tell me whether you can join us tomorrow.
examples.chinese: 請告訴我你明天是否能加入我們。

examples.english: He couldn't decide whether to buy the blue shirt or the red one.
examples.chinese: 他無法決定是否要買藍色襯衫還是紅色襯衫。

examples.english: She wondered whether it was too late to apply for the club.
examples.chinese: 她想知道是否太晚申請社團了。

examples.english: Please stand still while I take your photo.
examples.chinese: 請站住不要動，我來幫你拍照。

examples.english: My brother can't stand eating spicy food.
examples.chinese: 我哥哥受不了吃辣的食物。

examples.english: Let's buy some juice at the fruit stand.
examples.chinese: 我們去水果攤買點果汁吧。

examples.english: Everyone was excited for the trip except for John.
examples.chinese: 除了約翰，大家都對這次旅行很興奮。

examples.english: The store is open every day except Sunday.
examples.chinese: 這家店每天都營業，除了星期天。

examples.english: He does nothing except play video games.
examples.chinese: 他什麼事都不做，除了玩電動。

examples.english: I want to join the art club next semester.
examples.chinese: 我下學期想加入美術社。

examples.english: Our science club learns about experiments every week.
examples.chinese: 我們的科學社每週都學習實驗。

examples.english: She is the president of the English speaking club.
examples.chinese: 她是英語會話社的社長。

examples.english: Many people enjoy playing chess as a fun and challenging hobby.
examples.chinese: 許多人喜歡玩西洋棋，將它當作有趣且具挑戰性的嗜好。

examples.english: To be good at chess, you must learn to plan ahead.
examples.chinese: 要擅長西洋棋，你必須學會預先計畫。

examples.english: She made a clever move in the chess game and won.
examples.chinese: 她在西洋棋局中下了一步妙棋，並贏得了勝利。

examples.english: The teacher wrote on the blackboard with a piece of white chalk.
examples.chinese: 老師用一枝白色粉筆在黑板上寫字。

examples.english: He will chalk the important points on the board for everyone.
examples.chinese: 他會用粉筆把重點寫在板上，給大家看。

examples.english: The gym floor has white chalk lines for the basketball game.
examples.chinese: 體育館地板上有用粉筆畫的白色界線，供籃球比賽使用。

examples.english: My dad enjoys reading the newspaper with his coffee every Sunday.
examples.chinese: 我爸爸喜歡每個星期天邊喝咖啡邊看報紙。

examples.english: This morning's newspaper has important news about our city.
examples.chinese: 今天早上的報紙有關於我們城市的重要新聞。

examples.english: You can buy a local newspaper from that small convenience store.
examples.chinese: 你可以從那間小便利商店買到一份當地報紙。

examples.english: I need some glue to fix this broken toy quickly.
examples.chinese: 我需要一些膠水來快速修理這個壞掉的玩具。

examples.english: Please glue these two pieces of paper together carefully.
examples.chinese: 請小心地把這兩張紙黏在一起。

examples.english: Her eyes were glued to the TV screen during the show.
examples.chinese: 在節目期間，她的眼睛緊盯著電視螢幕。

examples.english: We need to hurry, or we'll miss the train.
examples.chinese: 我們需要趕快，不然我們會錯過火車。

examples.english: He was in a hurry and left his keys at home.
examples.chinese: 他很匆忙，把鑰匙忘在家裡了。

examples.english: There's no need to hurry; we have plenty of time.
examples.chinese: 我們不用趕快；我們有很多時間。

examples.english: Gardening is a wonderful hobby for many elderly people.
examples.chinese: 園藝對許多老年人來說是個很棒的嗜好。

examples.english: Having a hobby helps you relax and enjoy life more.
examples.chinese: 擁有一項嗜好能幫助你放鬆並更享受生活。

examples.english: He picked up photography as a new hobby last year.
examples.chinese: 他去年把攝影發展成一項新嗜好。

examples.english: She walked across the bridge to the other side.
examples.chinese: 她走過橋到對面。

examples.english: The library is across the street from the park.
examples.chinese: 圖書館就在公園的對面。

examples.english: I came across an old coin in my grandmother's box.
examples.chinese: 我在奶奶的盒子裡偶然發現了一枚舊硬幣。

examples.english: She wore a bright pink vest for her morning run.
examples.chinese: 她早上慢跑時穿了一件亮粉色背心。

examples.english: He matched his new suit with a stylish vest.
examples.chinese: 他用一件時髦的背心來搭配他的新西裝。

examples.english: Remember to wear a life vest before you get on the boat.
examples.chinese: 在你上船之前，記得穿上救生衣。

examples.english: I have a deep interest in reading detective novels.
examples.chinese: 我對閱讀偵探小說有很深的興趣。

examples.english: This historical drama holds great interest for many students.
examples.chinese: 這部歷史劇讓許多學生非常感興趣。

examples.english: You should take an interest in your school activities.
examples.chinese: 你應該對學校活動保持興趣。

examples.english: My friend is very interested in learning about different cultures.
examples.chinese: 我的朋友對學習不同文化很感興趣。

examples.english: Are you interested in joining our book club next month?
examples.chinese: 你對下個月加入我們的讀書俱樂部有興趣嗎？

examples.english: We are interested to see the results of the experiment.
examples.chinese: 我們對實驗的結果很感興趣。

examples.english: Reading a good book brings me much pleasure.
examples.chinese: 讀一本好書帶給我很多樂趣。

examples.english: It's always a pleasure to learn new things.
examples.chinese: 學習新事物總是一件樂事。

examples.english: It was a great pleasure to meet you.
examples.chinese: 很高興見到你。

examples.english: My uncle wants to start his own business.
examples.chinese: 我叔叔想開創自己的事業。

examples.english: He often travels abroad for business.
examples.chinese: 他常常為了生意出國。

examples.english: Please don't ask; it's none of your business.
examples.chinese: 請別問；那不關你的事。

examples.english: Adding a little salt can make vegetables taste much better.
examples.chinese: 加一點鹽可以讓蔬菜嘗起來好很多。

examples.english: Long ago, people used salt to preserve fish for winter.
examples.chinese: 很久以前，人們用鹽來保存魚類過冬。

examples.english: His rude comment just rubbed salt in her wound.
examples.chinese: 他粗魯的評論只是在她的傷口上撒鹽。

examples.english: We always buy a large popcorn when we watch a movie.
examples.chinese: 我們看電影時總會買一大份爆米花。

examples.english: Making popcorn at home is a fun and easy snack.
examples.chinese: 在家做爆米花是一種有趣又簡單的點心。

examples.english: I prefer sweet popcorn over salty popcorn.
examples.chinese: 我比較喜歡甜味爆米花勝過鹹味爆米花。

examples.english: I often go to the bakery near my house for fresh bread.
examples.chinese: 我常常去我家附近的麵包店買新鮮麵包。

examples.english: This bakery is famous for its delicious pineapple cakes.
examples.chinese: 這家麵包店以其美味的鳳梨酥而聞名。

examples.english: The smell of warm bread always welcomes me at the bakery.
examples.chinese: 溫暖的麵包香氣總是在麵包店裡迎接我。

examples.english: They need to inform the public about the new policy.
examples.chinese: 他們需要讓公眾知道這項新政策。

examples.english: Public libraries offer free books to everyone.
examples.chinese: 公立圖書館提供免費書籍給每個人。

examples.english: The park is a public place for everyone to enjoy.
examples.chinese: 這個公園是個開放的公共場所供大家享樂。

examples.english: The large truck delivered fresh vegetables to the market.
examples.chinese: 這輛大型卡車將新鮮蔬菜運到市場。

examples.english: The fire truck quickly arrived to put out the building fire.
examples.chinese: 消防車迅速趕到現場撲滅建築物火災。

examples.english: We need to truck these old boxes to the recycling center.
examples.chinese: 我們需要用卡車將這些舊箱子運到回收中心。

examples.english: I live in a comfortable apartment with my family. (9 words)
examples.chinese: 我跟家人住在一間舒適的公寓裡。

examples.english: They are looking for a bigger apartment with three rooms. (11 words)
examples.chinese: 他們正在找一間有三間房的較大公寓。

examples.english: Our new apartment is on the tenth floor of that building. (13 words)
examples.chinese: 我們的新公寓在那棟大樓的十樓。

examples.english: The sun gives off a lot of heat in summer.
examples.chinese: 夏天太陽會散發很多熱能。

examples.english: Please heat the milk before you drink it.
examples.chinese: 請在喝牛奶前將它加熱。

examples.english: We need to turn on the heat when it gets cold.
examples.chinese: 天氣變冷時我們需要打開暖氣。

examples.english: My boss is usually strict, but fair.
examples.chinese: 我的老闆通常很嚴格，但是很公平。

examples.english: The coffee shop boss makes delicious drinks.
examples.chinese: 這間咖啡店的老闆煮的飲料很好喝。

examples.english: My older sister always tries to boss me around.
examples.chinese: 我姐姐總是想對我發號施令。

examples.english: Never talk to a stranger on your way home.
examples.chinese: 回家路上絕不要跟陌生人說話。

examples.english: In a new school, I felt like a stranger.
examples.chinese: 在新的學校裡，我感覺自己像個陌生人。

examples.english: He helped a stranger find his lost dog.
examples.chinese: 他幫一位陌生人找到他走失的狗。

examples.english: The important meeting will begin soon in the conference room.
examples.chinese: 這場重要的會議即將在會議室開始。

examples.english: Their first meeting was at the school library last year.
examples.chinese: 他們第一次見面是在去年學校圖書館。

examples.english: I have a meeting with my project group after class today.
examples.chinese: 我今天下課後要和我的專案小組開會。

examples.english: The teacher asked a question, and he nodded in agreement.
examples.chinese: 老師問了一個問題，他點頭表示同意。

examples.english: When they met, he gave a quick nod instead of saying hello.
examples.chinese: 當他們見面時，他點頭示意而不是說哈囉。

examples.english: The coach nodded, allowing the player to enter the game.
examples.chinese: 教練點了點頭，允許那位球員上場比賽。

examples.english: My little brother was born in Taichung in April.
examples.chinese: 我的小弟弟在四月於台中出生。

examples.english: Sarah was born a natural leader and always organizes group projects.
examples.chinese: 莎拉天生就是個領導者，總是組織團體專案。

examples.english: He was born into a poor family but worked hard to succeed.
examples.chinese: 他出生於貧困家庭，但努力工作取得成功。

results.error: API Error: No image data in response

examples.english: It was a stupid mistake to leave the door unlocked.
examples.chinese: 沒把門鎖上是個愚蠢的錯誤。

examples.english: Please don't say anything stupid during the presentation.
examples.chinese: 請在簡報時不要說任何愚蠢的話。

examples.english: He made a stupid rule that nobody understood.
examples.chinese: 他訂了一條沒人懂的愚蠢規定。

examples.english: She is always polite when she talks to older people. (10 words)
examples.chinese: 她和長輩說話時總是很有禮貌。

examples.english: It's polite to say "thank you" when someone helps you. (11 words)
examples.chinese: 當有人幫助你時，說「謝謝」是有禮貌的。

examples.english: If you are polite, people will usually like you more. (11 words)
examples.chinese: 如果你有禮貌，人們通常會更喜歡你。

examples.english: He drinks less coffee now.
examples.chinese: 他現在喝比較少的咖啡。

examples.english: You should spend less than one hour on your phone every day.
examples.chinese: 你每天應該花不到一小時在手機上。

examples.english: Many students read less and less paper books now.
examples.chinese: 許多學生現在看越來越少的紙本書了。

examples.english: It is possible to learn English well with daily practice.
examples.chinese: 透過每天練習，學好英文是可能的。

examples.english: A possible reason for his absence is that he is sick.
examples.chinese: 他缺席的一個可能原因是，他生病了。

examples.english: Please come to school as early as possible tomorrow.
examples.chinese: 請你明天盡可能早點來學校。

examples.english: They hope to become rich and travel the world.
examples.chinese: 他們希望能變得富有並環遊世界。

examples.english: Taiwan has a rich history and diverse culture.
examples.chinese: 台灣擁有豐富的歷史和多元的文化。

examples.english: Fruits are a rich source of vitamins for our body.
examples.chinese: 水果是我們身體維生素的豐富來源。

examples.english: She has beautiful brown eyes that sparkle in the sun.
examples.chinese: 她有一雙在陽光下閃閃發光的棕色美麗眼睛。

examples.english: The sun will brown your skin if you stay out too long.
examples.chinese: 如果你在外面待太久，太陽會把你的皮膚曬成棕色。

examples.english: Autumn leaves turn a lovely shade of brown before falling.
examples.chinese: 秋天的葉子在掉落前會變成可愛的棕色。

examples.english: My friend is an honest person who always tells the truth.
examples.chinese: 我的朋友是一個誠實的人，他總是說實話。

examples.english: To be honest, I think that movie was a little boring.
examples.chinese: 老實說，我覺得那部電影有點無聊。

examples.english: She found the lost phone and was honest enough to return it.
examples.chinese: 她找到了遺失的手機，而且很誠實地歸還了。

examples.english: My mom loves to bake delicious cookies for us.
examples.chinese: 我的媽媽喜歡為我們烘培美味的餅乾。

examples.english: She will bake a large birthday cake for her brother.
examples.chinese: 她將為她的弟弟烘培一個大生日蛋糕。

examples.english: The aroma of freshly baked bread filled the kitchen.
examples.chinese: 新鮮烘培的麵包香氣充滿了廚房。

examples.english: A large dog suddenly attacked the boy on his way home.
examples.chinese: 一隻大狗突然在男孩回家路上攻擊了他。

examples.english: It's wrong to attack someone's character instead of their ideas.
examples.chinese: 攻擊一個人的品格而非想法是錯誤的。

examples.english: Let's attack this difficult project with all our energy.
examples.chinese: 讓我們全力以赴地著手處理這個困難的專案。

examples.english: Could you please lend me your pencil for the exam?
examples.chinese: 你可以借我你的鉛筆考試用嗎？

examples.english: My classmates always lend a hand when I have difficulty.
examples.chinese: 當我遇到困難時，我的同學總會幫忙。

examples.english: Sometimes you just need a friend to lend an ear.
examples.chinese: 有時候你只需要一個朋友來傾聽。

examples.english: He had to borrow a book from the library for his report.
examples.chinese: 他為了報告，必須向圖書館借一本書。

examples.english: My parents decided to borrow money from the bank for a new house.
examples.chinese: 我的父母決定向銀行借錢買新房子。

examples.english: The artist often borrows ideas from different cultures for her paintings.
examples.chinese: 這位藝術家經常從不同文化中借用想法來作畫。
